summary:
This Mod is brought to you Virus & Malicious free by JEHINC.
Video here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yjuJKK6Aerw
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a big house across the river from Riverwood. The house contains all kinds of goodies for you to keep and to use at your will. Enjoy. ;)

This is my first mod with Skyrim, also my first mod even created. I made it like a year or so ago and haven't used the Creation Kit since.... So credit me if you will and don't forget to credit Bethesda for creating an awesome ass game! :D

To install just copy the "Data Folder" to your Skyrim installation folder. Should be in Program Files/Steam... depends what version of the game you have... No biggie...

After installed, make sure to "Check Mark" (Riverwood House.esp) in the "Data Files" in the Skyrim Launcher. Enjoy!!

NOTE::
Virus and Malicious free according to my Anti-Virus Software.

Dates of Upload: 8/16/13 (4shared)
2/5/14 (NexusMods)

Don't forget to check out my YouTube Channel for gameplay vids and game trailers! http://www.youtube.com/user/JEHINC09
author: Jeh1990 - JEHINC
